text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Oh, this? My fans love it when 
I post my favorite stuff.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Some of them look for the same thing 
to buy… And some even came to know 
me through these～

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe♪ 
One snappy leads to new encounters☆
